item.title: Issues re Reporting tools and Frameworks
item.description: Objective Simple code to generate the Jasper Reports Charting Samples Target Audience Developers new to Jasper Reports Source Documents jasper reports jasper reports server samples jasper reports workflow jasper reports syntax jasper reports library jasper reports charts ant ivy intergration gradle wrapper Summary A refactor of the jasper reports charts samples from the jasper reports server samples to run with the gradle wrapper. Result A Demo app run with the gradle wrapper using
